name: NSFileProviderItemFields
desc: Fields that specify which of the item’s properties have changed.

items.name: static var parentItemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemFields
items.desc: The identity of the directory that contains the item.

items.name: static var lastUsedDate: NSFileProviderItemFields
items.desc: The date the item was last used.

items.name: static var fileSystemFlags: NSFileProviderItemFields
items.desc: The flags describing the item’s on-disk representation.

items.name: static var typeAndCreator: NSFileProviderItemFields
items.desc: The file type and creator codes for the item.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates an option instance from the raw value.
